quiz.question: Which phobia describes fear of small animals like mice?
Which medication class is sometimes prescribed for social phobia symptoms?
Which rare phobia means fear of the color red?
Which therapeutic approach emphasizes changing fearful thoughts alongside exposure?
Which behavioral researcher exposed children to fearful stimuli to demonstrate unlearning of phobias?
Which phobia concerns fear of falling while asleep or sleep itself?
Which phobia is associated with a vasovagal fainting reaction?
Which phobia category often shows a biphasic physiological response including fainting?
Which phobia describes fear of public speaking?
Which culture-bound fear emphasizes offending others rather than physical danger?
Which neurobiological area is frequently implicated in conditioned fear and phobic responses?
What distinguishes a phobia from normal fear clinically?
Which phobia term describes fear of aging or growing old and associated changes?
